results.name: Number of integer triangles with integer inradius, perimeter n and relatively prime side lengths.
reference: Mohammad K. Azarian, Circumradius and Inradius, Problem S125, Math Horizons, Vol. 15, Issue 4, April 2008, p. 32.  Solution published in Vol. 16, Issue 2, November 2008, p. 32.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 05 2002
